channel.title: [BUG] Stuck in Wall in Reactor Maintenance Tunnel (After Load)
channel.description:
[b][i]LOCATION[/i][/b] In the reactor maintenance tunnel that you swim through from the auxiliary coolant tank to the main reactor. [setpos -1157.307495 -95.198456 -887.755737;setang 21.191437 44.517006 -0.618001]
[b][i]DETAILS[/i][/b] I was swimming through the reactor maintenance tunnel pressing against the top left of the tunnel. After the loading screen I was stuck there unable to move until I drowned. This continued on auto-load as well. Luckily I had a manual save beforehand.
[b][i]SCREENSHOT[/i][/b] ![](upload://t8Wr5WDZx1D3oNyQXFUlFWMjAZu.jpeg)
NOTE: This bug is easily reproducible.

item.title: [BUG] Stuck in Wall in Reactor Maintenance Tunnel (After Load)
item.dc:creator: AtlasNR
item.description:
LOCATION
In the reactor maintenance tunnel that you swim through from the auxiliary coolant tank to the main reactor.
[setpos -1157.307495 -95.198456 -887.755737;setang 21.191437 44.517006 -0.618001]

DETAILS
I was swimming through the reactor maintenance tunnel pressing against the top left of the tunnel. After the loading screen I was stuck there unable to move until I drowned. This continued on auto-load as well. Luckily I had a manual save beforehand.
